sourcesContent:
import React,{useState} from 'react' const CatComponent = (props)=>{ const [current, setCurrent] = useState(0) const handleNext = (e)=>{ props.posts.cat.length === current ? document.getElementById('next').style.backgroundColor = 'grey' : setCurrent(current+1) } const handlePrevious = (e)=>{ (current ===0) ? document.getElementById('previous').style.backgroundColor = 'grey' : setCurrent(current-1) } return(
{props.intro.caption}
{props.intro.category}
{props.posts.cat[current]}
Latest News
{props.posts.latest_news}
Top News
{props.posts.top_news}
) } export default CatComponent
